name: Dodge v1.2
description:
Rules:

Use WASD or arrow keys to move

Dodge the red circles, they kill you!

The grey circles dont kill you, but they will push you around

Update Log:

v1: Initial Release

v1.1: QoL changes, minor tweaks

v1.2: Score system + smoother movement

Update Plans (not guaranteed to come):

Music and sounds

More circle types
